masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Someone hacked our ATM network—and every other bank in the city! All Christmas bonus withdrawals are FROZEN. A message on every screen says 'Bah Humbug—Your Money Is Mine Now.' Millions of dollars in holiday pay, just... gone. People can't buy presents, pay bills, nothing!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Trace the hack to its source
  • Restore access to the frozen funds
  • Find out who's behind 'The Scrooge Protocol'
